author: jvanzyl
msg: - reworking some of the configuration logic to make sure that
keys are returned in the order they are specified in
a props file and/or the order they are set dynamically.
this is to ensure that resource loaders are searched in
the order they are specified, and that paths within loaders
are searched in the order specified.
